r.s: Pure-PHP arbitrary precission integer arithmetic library
r.d: Supports base-2, base-10, base-16, and base-256 numbers. Uses the GMP or BCMath extensions, if available, and an internal implementation, otherwise.
r.n: - significant speed-ups - new functions: gcd(), extendedGCD(), isPrime(), random(), randomPrime(), bitwise_leftRotate(), bitwise_rightRotate(), setPrecision(), toHex(), toBits() and equals() - PHP_Compat is now optional. Store it in your include path if you require PHP4 support but otherwise it is unrequired.
